_sText:
If I did not give you credit for a texutre you made, please leave a comment below or send me a message. I forget where I got all of my textures.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everyone runs to the center of spawn to get teleported above everyone (just like in multigame maps). Whoever is teleported gets to pick what settings he wants everyone to have for the round.

Weapons
-M4a1
-Awp
-Deagle

HP
-1
-100
-500

Speed
-0.5
-1.0
-2.0

Once the player picks all of the settings for the round, everyone will be teleported to the arena to fight to the death. You will have 3 minutes to kill eachother. If the time runs out, everyone alive will be killed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PICTURES

1.) Spawn (Top)
2.) Spawn (Bottom)
3.) Arena
4.) Arena 
5.) Teleporter on CT side. 
6.) Arena

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**CHANGES FOR V2**

- Made the spawn things rotate slower.
- Changed alot of textures.
- Fixed the skybox.
- Moved some stuff around.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**CHANGES FOR V3**

- Fixed spawn where alot of people die.
- Added teleports in each side of arena (picture 5).
- Changed some textures.
- Fixed arena where some people health doesn't change.
